## Final Project Milestone 3
Latest Polls from FiveThirtyEight
Source: https://github.com/fivethirtyeight/data/tree/master/polls

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
president_primary_polls <- read.csv("president_primary_polls.csv")
```

```{r}
president_primary_polls
```

```{r}
president_primary_polls |>
  filter(party == "REP") |>
  group_by(candidate_name) |>
  summarize(mean_pct = mean(pct)) |>
  filter(mean_pct >= 3.0) |>
  arrange(desc(mean_pct)) |>
  knitr::kable(digits = 2)
```
